settings.title: FAQ Block label
settings.heading: What are your shipping charges?
settings.content: Exact shipping and delivery charges are determined by your location and the package weight. Please utilize the shipping calculator at checkout for your specific shipment cost. USA shipping starts at $6 for Priority Mail through the USPS. International shipping starts at $10 for standard shipping and $20 for DHL Express Shipping.

settings.title: FAQ Block label
settings.heading: Where do you ship to?
settings.content:
We ship WORLDWIDE! 
We are proud to ship throughout the US and worldwide!
Domestic
For all USA shipments, we use priority shipping through USPS. You can track your package from when it leaves our warehouse through its final destination.
International
For all international shipments, we use DHL, the world’s leading logistics provider.

settings.title: FAQ Block label
settings.heading: How long does shipping take?
settings.content:
U.S.A. shipments can take 3-5 days after processing.
If the order is placed during a weekend or holiday, processing can take 2-3 days.
International shipments vary by destination and shipping method.

settings.title: FAQ Block label
settings.heading: Will I be charged duty fees?
settings.content:
Our company is based in the USA. All of our US orders are free of duty fees. 
While most of our orders are free of any Import Taxes or Duty Fees, we cannot be held responsible for any taxes, seizures or fees from importing our product. By complying with all local standards and regulations, we do our very best avoid any possible charges your country may assess your shipment. The final decision is decided by your country's import regulations. You may contact your local customs agent if you have any questions regarding additional fees on your shipment.

settings.subheading_text: If you’d like further information about Four Reasons and you can’t find it in our FAQs, please get in touch. Simply fill out the form, include your message, and we’ll get back to you as soon as we can.
settings.faq_subheading_text: Please read our FAQ before sending us a message.

settings.title: Use of Cookies
settings.heading: Use of Cookies
settings.content:
Gravida consequat consectetur vel quam imperdiet amet vulputate eu aenean a diam netus adipiscing varius inceptos duis dolor mi netus duis ut conubia parturient taciti ac. settings.text_1: We believe in the wonderful imperfection of life. We believe that everyone is beautiful the way they are, down to every hair strand

settings.title: Product Color Mask Grid
settings.sub_header_text: Toning & Conditioning Treatments and Shampoos extend the life of your hair color

settings.title: Product Professional Grid
settings.sub_header_text: Professional, high-quality vegan hair care in a sustainable way

settings.title: Product Nature Grid
settings.sub_header_text: Keep the nature close, by your side. Bring out your beauty in a Natural way, with truly effective products

settings.title: Product Optima Grid
settings.sub_header_text: One thousand hair stylist helped us develop their dream hair color line.

settings.header_title: Find the Hair Products That Match Your Need

settings.title: The Right to Feel Beautiful
settings.text: As a beauty company, our greatest responsibility is to create and diversify a person’s idea of beauty, while inspiring a respect for everyone’s own uniqueness. We encourage everyone to appreciate themselves as they are and offer tools for creating a positive self-image through marketing communications and preventative charity work.

settings.title: European quality and reliability
settings.text: All our products are made in Finland and at our partner factories in Europe, which have been granted an ISO 22716:2007 certificate. Our products meet the criteria of the EU regulation on cosmetic products and Good Manufac- turing Practices (GMP). We ensure the high quality of our products and their suitability for use in hair salons by collaborating with Finnish hair care professionals in product testing.

settings.title: Effective vegan products
settings.text: Our products only contain the very best ingredients also from an ethical standpoint. In 2019, up to 95% of our products are vegan. Our goal is to make 100% of our products vegan by the end of 2020.

settings.title: Packaging that doesn't harm the environment
settings.text: In our packaging, we use recyclable materials and promote their recycling by package labelling and sustainability communications. Our goal is to replace all our plastic packaging with recycled and bioplastic or other more ecological packaging materials without compromising the products’ effectiveness and user experience.

settings.header_title: Highlight the colors in your life
settings.header_text: Life is never black and white. At best, it’s wonderful, passionate, fun and enticing. The freedom and courage to be exactly who you are. Four Reasons Color Mask is an up-to-date selection of toning hair products that accentuate the color of your hair in a subtle or bold way. Their conditioning, vegan and pigment-rich composition extends the life of your hair color and keeps it intense.

settings.header_title: Not sure which shade to choose?
settings.header_text: Soft pastel, platinum blonde, chocolaty brown, or vibrant red? Take a quick quiz and find your perfect Color Mask Treatment shade — to highlight the colors in your life!

Four Reasons Color Mask is an up-to-date selection of toning hair products that accentuate the color of your hair in a subtle or bold way. Their conditioning, vegan and pigment-rich composition extends the life of your hair color and keeps it intense.

settings.title: Toning Treatment
settings.text: As well as a rich dose of pigment, our toning Color Mask Treatments give your hair strength and nourishment with the help of plant-based proteins and amino acids. The end result is healthy hair with a vibrant blaze of color. Use instead of traditional conditioner whenever your hair color needs refreshing.
settings.title1: Restores the glow of your hair color
settings.title2: Leaves your hair healthy and shiny

settings.title: Toning Shampoo
settings.text: Rich in color pigment, Color Mask Toning Shampoos clean color-treated hair as gently as possible, increase shine and effectively remove static. Use instead of traditional shampoo whenever you want to boost the intensity of your hair color and increase its glow. Sulfate-free and vegan composition.

settings.header_title: Pure premium, for you and your hair
settings.header_text: You know yourself and what you like. You show your strengths and dare to be who you really are. We created Four Reasons Professional product line for you, because you deserve something uniquely wonderful. Our products have been designed for the demanding needs of hair industry professionals and they are manufactured from top-quality, vegan ingredients in a way that respects the environment.
How to create beautiful bouncy cirls with Multibenefit Detangling Spray and Working Spray

settings.title: Shampoos & Conditioners
settings.text: High-quality Four Reasons Professional hair care products work wonders for your hair, professional style. The formulas cleanse, condition and care for different hair types in the best possible way. Find the hair products that are perfect for you and work small wonders every time you use them.
settings.title2: Hair that looks and feels great

settings.title: Styling & Finishing Products
settings.text: It is easy to create lasting, high-quality hairstyles with our Professional styling products. The formulas have been developed for the demanding needs of professional hair stylists and they work fantastically in daily styling as well as creating gala updos. By combining different products, you can create a style that brings out the best qualities of your hair – there are products designed for each hair type and style. You are ready for each new day and night. Take your style to the next level!

settings.header_title: The hair color line of your dreams
settings.header_text: Optima blurs the line between permanent and semi-permanent colors – you can use the same versatile color line for all kinds of color work that is needed in the salon. The shades are beautifully translucent and exceptionally deep at the same time. Optima is perfume-free and 100 % vegan.

In the core of the hair color is our exclusive HydraRepair™ technology, which is based on the effects of plant-based keratin and collagen working together. The damage-repairing properties of phytokeratin and the intensively hydrating properties of phytocollagen support each other’s functions within the HydraRepair™ technology, protecting, repairing and hydrating hair during the processing time. In addition to the HydraRepair™ technology, Optima also features nourishing natural oils like Meadowfoam seed oil, Mono de Tahiti oil and Baobab oil, which nourish, strengthen, and provide shine, hydration, and moisture.

settings.title: Cover
settings.text: Cover shades combine powerful coverage and a brown tone. Cover shades have been divided into three groups: cool, neutral and warm. When used alone, these shades give a soft, beautiful tone while also covering grey hair.

settings.title: Reflection & Intense
settings.text: Reflection shades are pre-mixed, natural tone combinations that create fantastic, muted brown and copper tones.Intense shades are intensive and pure. They can be used alone to create a strong tone or mixed with other shades when you want to intensify the shade’s character.

settings.title: Mixer
settings.text: Mixer shades are the creative tools of the color line that can be used to change the chosen shades as wanted or to create strong, extremely vibrant colors.

settings.title: Highlift
settings.text: Highlift shades achieve a powerful lightening effect and an effective neutralizing of yellow tones at the same time.

settings.title: Responsible beauty for your hair type

settings.header_text: Four Reasons Nature hair products are designed to accentuate your beauty in a natural way, without compromising the effectiveness of the products. They combine freedom and a strong will to create a better tomorrow, today. Because this product range has been awarded the Cosmos Natural certificate issued by ECOCERT®, you can rely on the naturalness of its ingredients and the eco-friendliness of its packaging.

The active ingredients of the Four Reasons Nature range are natural and plant-based extracts, proteins and oils. Their beneficial ingredients nourish, moisturize, repair and add volume according to hair type, effectively and on nature’s terms.

settings.title: Moisture
settings.text: Moisturizing Four Reasons Nature Moisture products give dry hair the softness it needs and ensure that the hair regains its optimal moisture balance. These conditioning products provide your hair with a powerful dose of natural, beneficial nutrients, making dry hair elastic and vibrant again.

settings.title: Color
settings.text: Offering protection for hair color, the Four Reasons Nature Color products extend the life of the color and give your hair a wonderful shine that beautifully enhances your hair color. Even fine hair gets to enjoy silky softness and smoothness without becoming flat. A glowing hair color looks stunning in healthy, well-cared for hair.

settings.title: Volume
settings.text: Four Reasons Nature Volume products give fine hair natural body and volume. The hair’s moisture balance remains ideal, and hair feels and looks smooth. Voluminous hair that feels full, smooth and well-cared for.

settings.title: Rebuild
settings.text: Rescuers of stressed hair, Four Reasons Nature Rebuild products effectively repair damaged hair. Their nutritious and protein-rich ingredients repair damage caused by chemical treatments or heat-styling tools and strengthen hair that craves care and attention. They make stressed and damaged hair healthy, soft and vibrant.

settings.title: The Right to Feel Beautiful
settings.text: As a beauty company, our greatest responsibility is to create and diversify a person’s idea of beauty, while inspiring a respect for everyone’s own uniqueness. We encourage everyone to appreciate themselves as they are and offer tools for creating a positive self-image through marketing communications and preventative charity work.

settings.title: European quality and reliability
settings.text: All our products are made in Finland and at our partner factories in Europe, which have been granted an ISO 22716:2007 certificate. Our products meet the criteria of the EU regulation on cosmetic products and Good Manufac- turing Practices (GMP). We ensure the high quality of our products and their suitability for use in hair salons by collaborating with Finnish hair care professionals in product testing.

settings.title: Effective vegan products
settings.text: Our products only contain the very best ingredients also from an ethical standpoint. In 2019, up to 95% of our products are vegan. Our goal is to make 100% of our products vegan by the end of 2020.

settings.title: Packaging that doesn't harm the environment
settings.text: In our packaging, we use recyclable materials and promote their recycling by package labelling and sustainability communications. Our goal is to replace all our plastic packaging with recycled and bioplastic or other more ecological packaging materials without compromising the products’ effectiveness and user experience.

settings.group1_description: We walk the front line, championing diversity, and defend everyone’s right to feel beautiful. We inspire and empower people to appreciate themselves as they are — perfectly imperfect – and offer them the tools for strengthening their self-image.
settings.group2_description:
We believe in the wonderful imperfection of life. We believe in people, passion, authenticity and you. We believe that everyone is beautiful as they are, down to the last strand of hair. These are our four reasons.
We started some 20 years ago from scratch. We grew into the most successful hair product company in Finland by working hard and with a passion. We have swum against the current, boldly done things our own way and celebrated being different without paying attention to beauty ideals.
settings.group3_text: People’s dissatisfaction with their looks has increased significantly in recent years. Studies show that up to 50% of young people have a negative self-image. The increased use of social media has raised the social pressure related to appearance. Being continuously exposed to the ideals created by society and the media has a negative impact on how young people in particular view themselves and their bodies.
settings.group3_description: It’s time to take a step forward and defend everyone’s right to feel beautiful

settings.text: PAYMENT SECURITY
settings.content: Encryption ensures increased transaction security. SSL technology protects data linked to personal and payment info
